Wisdom: النَّاسُ أَبْنَاءٌ الدُّنْيَا وَالْوَلَدُ مَطْبُوعٌ عَلَى حُبِّ أُمِّهِ
enWisdom: People are children of this world, and a child is naturally inclined to love its mother

Wisdom: كُونُوا مِنْ أَبْنَاءِ الْآخِرَةِ وَلَا تَكُونُوا مِنْ أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا فَإِنَّ كُلَّ وَلَدٍ سَيَلْحَقُ بِأُمِّهِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ
enWisdom: Be from the children of the Hereafter and do not be from the children of this world, for every child will cling to his mother on the Day of Resurrection

Wisdom: خُلْطَةُ أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا رَأْسُ الْبَلْوَى وَفَسَادُ التَّقْوَى
enWisdom: Mingling with those who are attached to this world is the primary cause of affliction and corruption of piety

Wisdom: خُلْطَةُ أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا تَشِينُ الدِّينَ وَتُضَعِّفُ الْيَقِينَ
enWisdom: Mingling with those who are attached to this world tarnishes religion and weakens certitude

Wisdom: مَنْ قَصَّرَ نَظَرَهُ عَلَى أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا عَمِيَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ الْهُدَى
enWisdom: One who fixes his gaze on the children of this world is blinded from the path of guidance

Wisdom: مَوَدَّةُ أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا تَزُولُ لِأَدْنَى عَارِضٍ يَعْرُضُ
وُدَّ أَبْنَاءِ الدُّنْيَا يَنْقَطِعُ لِانْقِطَاعِ أَسْبَابِهِ
enWisdom: The friendship of worldly people is cut off when its [worldly] motives are severed
The servant of this world faces continuous afflictions and calamities
